Class JavaCompiler

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, BuildEventListener, MakeAction, Rule, SourceFileSet
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class JavaCompiler
extends AbstractPatternRule<JavaCompiler>
implements MakeAction

The JavaCompiler can be instantiated in a script to compile java files Use tablesaw.addons.java.JavaCRule instead

inBuildQueue

public void inBuildQueue()
                  throws TablesawException
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: Rule
This is to notify the rule that the rule has been placed in the build queue for a rebuild. This gives the rule the oportunity to delete any target files before rebuilding, this ensures a complete build.

Specified by:
inBuildQueue in interface Rule
Overrides:

Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: BuildEventListener
Called right before the primary target is set. This is a good place for any last minute changes to the build rules that need to take place.
